actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Safe Drinking Water Act to permit small communities to comply with certain notice provisions by an appropriate means other than through publication in a newspaper of general circulation.

summary.text: Amends the Safe Drinking Water Act to require the regulations of the Environmental Protection Agency to permit small community-operated public water systems to give notice, in lieu of publication in a newspaper of general circulation, in another appropriate manner, if a system does not meet contaminant level requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Safe Drinking Water Act to permit small communities to comply with certain notice provisions by an appropriate means other than through publication in a newspaper of general circulation.
